title: Ticket #3227: JobsAccumPostExecuteTime is incorrect - much too large
description:
statistics from submit-1 in CHTC are showing values for JobsAccumPostExecuteTime that a much to large to be reasonable. This countier is being mis-calculated in some way.

for example, a recent statistics query shows post-execute as 237* larger than JobsAccumRunningTime, and JobsAccumExecuteTime as 21* larger than JobsAccumRunningTime.

This output also shows a large number of jobs restarting, and I suspect that there is a correlation between jobs restarting and invalid values for AccumExecuteTime.

remarks:
2012-Sep-12 14:10:39 by johnkn:
The problem appears to be that if a job is evicted after transfer output has begun, runs again, and is evicted the second time before transfer output, then the JobCurrentStartTransferOutputDate attribute from the first run is used to calculate execute time for the second run. This bug impacts 7.8.3 as well, but is worse in 7.9.0 because more statistics are impacted.
2012-Sep-19 16:15:53 by zmiller:
Bulk change of target version from v070804 to v070805 using ./ticket-target-mover.
check_ins:
2012-Oct-03 12:03   Check-in [33574]: editing of 7.8.5 version history items ===GT=== #3221 ===GT=== #3227 (By Karen Miller )
2012-Oct-02 15:39   Check-in [33555]: Version history for #3227. JobsAccumExecuteTime and JobsAccumPostExecuteTime sometimes too large for jobs that have been restarted. (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
2012-Sep-12 14:34   Check-in [33324]: protect statistics from too large values for JobAccumExecuteTime and JobsAccumPostExecuteTime. if job is evicted during transfer input. (#3227). Ignore JobCurrentStartExecutingDate unless it is greater than JobStartDate. ===VersionHistory:Pending=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
2012-Sep-12 14:13   Check-in [33320]: fix for too large values for JobAccumExecuteTime and JobsAccumPostExecuteTime. (#3227) don't use JobsCurrentStartTransferOutputDate unless it is later than the JobStartDate for this run. ===VersionHistory:Pending=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
